issue.title: [CI][GLib] Documentation isn't generated
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7307](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7307). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/332154195#step:5:12092

```

 + rsync -a --delete '/usr/local/share/gtk-doc/html/*' /build/docs/c_glib
rsync: change_dir "/usr/local/share/gtk-doc/html" failed: No such file or directory (2)
rsync error: some files/attrs were not transferred (see previous errors) (code 23) at main.c(1196) [sender=3.1.2]
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7307?focusedCommentId=16988246) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5953
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5953>
